content:
Coffee is a must-have for any business trip! I've got you covered with some top-rated coffee shops near popular hotels in LA. Since I don't know the specific hotel you're staying at, I'll provide recommendations for a few areas:

**Downtown LA (near The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles, and The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites)**

1. **Stumptown Coffee Roasters**: Known for their high-quality, small-batch coffee, Stumptown has a location in the Arts District, just a short drive or Uber ride from downtown hotels.
2. **Verve Coffee Roasters**: This popular coffee chain has a location in the Spring Arcade Building, within walking distance of downtown hotels.
3. **Blue Bottle Coffee**: With a location in the Little Tokyo neighborhood, Blue Bottle is a short drive or walk from downtown hotels and offers a minimalist, high-quality coffee experience.

**Century City (near Hyatt Regency Century Plaza)**

1. **The Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf**: This LA-based coffee chain has a location in the Westfield Century City mall, just a short walk from the Hyatt Regency.
2. **Caffè Umberto**: This family-owned coffee shop is located in the Century City Marketplace, near the Hyatt Regency, and serves up Italian-style coffee and pastries.

**Santa Monica (near The Fairmont Miramar Hotel & Bungalows and The Ambrose Hotel)**

1. **Intelligentsia Coffee**: This Chicago-based coffee roaster has a location in Santa Monica, within walking distance of the beach and nearby hotels.
2. **Menotti's Coffee Stop**: This independent coffee shop is located in the heart of Santa Monica and serves up specialty coffee drinks and delicious pastries.

These are just a few of the many great coffee shops in LA. You can always ask your hotel concierge or a local for more recommendations based on your specific location and preferences.

Get your caffeine fix, and crush those meetings!
